did.unittitle: United States Postal Service Collective Bargaining Stamps, 1975- 1975
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: United States Postal Service Collective Bargaining Stamps, issued in 1975.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of United States Postal Service Collective Bargaining Stamps, issued on March 13, 1975. Stamps are affixed to envelopes noting the first day of issue and a sheet produced for the U.S. Postal Service on collective bargaining.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: United States Postal Service Collective Bargaining Stamps #6073m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
